DOC.brief_summary: The primary objective of this project is to determine the effects of decreasing sedentary behavior at work by at least 3hrs/day using treadmill (walking and standing) and sit-to-stand (standing only) workstations on the health of overweight office workers.
DOC.brief_title: Modifying the Workplace to Decrease Sedentary Behavior and Improve Health
DOC.criteria: Body Mass Index greater than 25 kg.m2 Does not engage in any structured physical activity lasting at least 30 mins for more than 2 days/week Employed in a fulltime sedentary desk job. No major orthopedic limitations or medical conditions that prevents walking or standing at a treadmill work sitstand workstation.
